knimeNode.name: Keras Multiply Layer
knimeNode.shortDescription: A layer that multiplies two inputs.

fullDescription.intro: A layer that multiplies two inputs element-wise. Corresponds to the Multiply Keras layer . The inputs must be of the same shape.
fullDescription.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network that is the first input of this Multiply layer.
The Keras deep learning network that is the second input of this Multiply layer.
ports.outPort: The two input Keras deep learning networks merged into one by the added Multiply layer.
